title: Martingaleboy
author: Martingaleboy
content: Hi i need 1 or 2 people to open account at binance using my code and verify it . i will send 10usdt if you complete the task .It takes 5minIt will help me to unlock a 100usdt reward as well as im 1 ref away. If interested my telegram @Faiza910 or pm.

comments.author: rby
comments.body: This is something anyone who coincidentally wants to open a binance account can do.But I doubt that $10 can move anyone who isn't interested in being KYCed.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: I'm not against your way of promoting your referral code and get more referrals, but do you think anyone here doesn't know binance yet for them to accept your offer? Knowing that binance is too popular and probably those who accept their terms and way of operating especially for those who are okay to provide their personal details are probably are registered already there.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Martingaleboy on May 19, 2023, 02:34:17 PMHi i need 1 or 2 people to open account at binance using my code and verify it . i will send 10usdt if you complete the task .It takes 5minIt will help me to unlock a 100usdt reward as well as im 1 ref away. If interested my telegram @Faiza910 or pm. it is a great idea that you are trying to promote your referral link on the forum by giving only 10$. But I doubt you will receive the fund or not if you cant share the link on any social media sites. You should know that they are able to verify where the lead came from and also if they can catch you are misusing the referral system then I think both the account of you and/or the account of the referred user will be banned.

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Martingaleboy on May 19, 2023, 02:34:17 PMHi i need 1 or 2 people to open account at binance using my code and verify it . i will send 10usdt if you complete the task .It takes 5minIt will help me to unlock a 100usdt reward as well as im 1 ref away. If interested my telegram @Faiza910 or pm. First of all, can you tell us which 100$ reward you are referring here ?Also since you are a newbbie with 3 posts only, maybe you do not pay anyone who signed under your referral code. So do you think you should go for a grantee that you will pay this 10$ who will do the task ? (as this task will require a KYC).If you think that 10$ is not worth the escrow, deal with anyone with a good repute by paying the amount first.

comments.author: Little Mouse
comments.body: Quote from: UmerIdrees on May 19, 2023, 05:04:07 PMFirst of all, can you tell us which 100$ reward you are referring here ?If I'm correct, it's 0.01 USDT to 10 USDT for each verified user you referred on Binance but the reward is in the form of a trading Fee rebate. As I'm promoting my referral link through my cryptocurrency blog, I'm getting a few referrals every now and then. I got the same offer as OP and I'm lacking 15 USDT more to reach $100, so I can withdraw the fund (as a trading fee rebate). OP, if you are thinking you are going to get them as USDT, I think you are missing some info (or am I). They are going to give you a trading fee rebate which still is a good offer though.

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on May 19, 2023, 05:37:41 PMQuote from: UmerIdrees on May 19, 2023, 05:04:07 PMFirst of all, can you tell us which 100$ reward you are referring here ?If I'm correct, it's 0.01 USDT to 10 USDT for each verified user you referred on Binance but the reward is in the form of a trading Fee rebate. As I'm promoting my referral link through my cryptocurrency blog, I'm getting a few referrals every now and then. I got the same offer as OP and I'm lacking 15 USDT more to reach $100, so I can withdraw the fund (as a trading fee rebate). OP, if you are thinking you are going to get them as USDT, I think you are missing some info (or am I). They are going to give you a trading fee rebate which still is a good offer though.I have been a Binance user for a long time and as far as I know, they have never offered a direct cash reward for just bringing in new users. A percentage of the trading fee that they make, Yes, but never only for new users.

They are going to give you a trading fee rebate which still is a good offer though.You are right but several times they give an offer. Yesterday I saw a 100$ offer and today I have seen it is a 50$ offer. So, op is trying to take such an offer, I think. Hopefully, think you have got the point of view of the OP. You can see the screenshot below. Also, you can check it from the Lite referral

comments.author: UmerIdrees
comments.body: Quote from: Little Mouse on May 19, 2023, 05:37:41 PMAs I'm promoting my referral link through my cryptocurrency blog, I'm getting a few referrals every now and then. Just a little out of context, would you like to share your blog ? Or you may share it with me via PM if it is suits you.  Quote from: examplens on May 19, 2023, 06:12:07 PMQuote from: Little Mouse on May 19, 2023, 05:37:41 PMQuote from: UmerIdrees on May 19, 2023, 05:04:07 PMFirst of all, can you tell us which 100$ reward you are referring here ?If I'm correct, it's 0.01 USDT to 10 USDT for each verified user you referred on Binance but the reward is in the form of a trading Fee rebate. OP, if you are thinking you are going to get them as USDT, I think you are missing some info (or am I). They are going to give you a trading fee rebate which still is a good offer though.I have been a Binance user for a long time and as far as I know, they have never offered a direct cash reward for just bringing in new users. A percentage of the trading fee that they make, Yes, but never only for new users.Maybe he knows the reward is in the form of trading fee rebate. Anyways as he told he was just one referral away, better he get that referral naturally as he may have got other referels. If he does not come to this thread again, it would mean his work has been done.  By the promoting referal links on the forum is prohibtded. Is it allowed to promote them via PM
